games.title: Moto X3M
games.description:
Moto X3M is an awesome bike game with challenging levels. Choose a bike, put your helmet on, pass obstacles, and get ready to beat the time on tons of off-road circuits. Have fun with Moto X3M! The controls are simple ‚Äì use the keyboard arrow keys to control the acceleration and deceleration, and also your tilt. Ride through each course and try to land your jumps perfectly ‚Äì if you angle your bike incorrectly you risk tipping your bike over! 
Each level features different obstacles and objects for you to traverse ‚Äì you will find this game both fun and challenging! This is off-road biking to the max and for any motorbike fan, this game will provide a huge amount of enjoyment!
games.howToPlayText:
WASD or ARROWS 
Press the up arrow key to accelerate
Balance your bike with the left and right arrow keys
Break by pressing the down arrow key
Perform flips and other stunts to gain time
Don't crash

games.title: Soccer Dash
games.description:
Soccer Dash is a soccer game in which you swipe a soccer ball through obstacles and soccer players and hit the ball to score a goal.

You have drag controls, drag to choose the direction of the kick, and release to hit the ball. During the dragging process, the game goes into a slow motion state, so you can take your time to choose the direction of the kick.
games.howToPlayText:
The goal of the game is to bypass all the traps and score a goal.
Control - swipe the ball. Change the direction of the kick and release to launch the ball.

games.title: Ragdoll Soccer
games.description: Enter the thrilling world of Ragdoll Soccer, where you command a stick figure footballer in exciting games. Aim to outscore rivals and become a champion, whether playing alone or with a friend, offering nonstop enjoyment on your phone or computer.
games.howToPlayText:
Play football with a stickman! A fun 2D sports game for one or two players!
Control the stickman like a doll and hit the ball to score a goal against the opponent.

Features of the game:
 - single player mode
- local multiplayer for two players
 - Championship mode
 - The game has boosters and abilities!
 - penalty shootout mode

To play with a PC, you can use:
- keyboard (WASD +QE)
- mouse
- gamepad
To play from your phone, use touch input

games.title: Pool 8
games.description:
Pool 8 is a brain-teasing puzzle game based on a Pool board. 
Pot the balls in the correct order to move through a series of increasingly difficult challenges!

There's a multitude of difficulty levels that you naturally progress through, starting with the easiest "rookie" level. At the end of each difficulty level, you get a chance to win extra retries in the "smash the candies" bonus round. You can also earn these by watching a short video ad.
Yes, but it starts out easy. As you progress, you reach higher difficulty levels.
games.howToPlayText:
The unique mechanics in this game mean you can only move up, down, left, and right. 
There are no diagonal movements, which poses a tricky challenge when several balls are on the table. 
The key to winning the level is to think about the order of each move to ensure you can line up all the shots successfully.

games.title: Hit & Knock Down
games.description:
Hit & Knock Down is a casual arcade-style shooting/throwing game where you aim to hit targets using various balls. When you successfully hit a target, it will either be knocked down or explode.
The goal is to clear each stage by obtaining the required score (or meeting stage objectives) and then move on to the next challenge.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag or swipe on the screen to aim the ball toward a target. (Typical of these types of games ‚Äî though the store page doesn‚Äôt detail exact controls, it says ‚Äúsimple control.‚Äù)
Release your touch (or tap, depending on control scheme) to throw the ball toward the designated target.
If your throw strikes the target (a can, dish, fruit, or object), it will either fall or explode. You earn points for successful hits.

games.title: Dummies World Cup
games.description:
Get ready for an exciting football challenge with Dummies World Cup, where you take command of a dummy representing your favorite national team. Immerse yourself in this captivating football game as you strive to score as many goals as possible before the final whistle. Choose from 32 national teams inspired by FIFA and engage in thrilling matches that will test your skills and strategies!


Game tips
To enhance your gameplay, focus on quick movements to outwit your opponent while choosing the right timing to kick the ball. Use feints to confuse the rival dummy and create scoring opportunities. Practicing your shooting and positioning will also help you rack up those goals!


How to play
Playing Dummies World Cup is a breeze! Simply select your favorite team, then control your dummy on the pitch. On computer, navigate using the arrow keys and hit the spacebar to kick. On your phone, tap to choose and use on-screen buttons for movement and kicking actions. Stay focused and strike at the right moments to outscore your opponent!


How to play Dummies World Cup for free?
You can enjoy Dummies World Cup for free on Playhop. Just visit our platform and dive into this thrilling experience along with many other exciting online games!


Controls
On a computer, use the arrow keys to maneuver your player around the field. The spacebar is your go-to for shooting the ball into the opponent‚Äôs goal. On a mobile device, make use of the touch controls to guide your dummy and strike, ensuring you‚Äôre agile as you play against other national teams.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag and drop with the mouse or touch to throw your dummy in the direction of the arrow.
All you have to do is choose their favorite contending national from 32 teams (according to FIFA) and go head-to-head with the opponent team‚Äôs dummy.

games.title: School Of Basketball
games.description: It is the basketball arcade game in which you must try to score baskets in all the different game modes available. A basketball school opens its doors for enthusiasts like you. Do you know where to aim the ball so that you always hit the basket? Do you know any secret strategies? You have a limited number of balls and every time you miss, you also miss one ball. However, if you never miss, on the contrary, sometimes the ball will be added. How many points will you score?
games.howToPlayText:
Touch and drug anywhere on screen to throw a ball!
You can play either arcade, time attack, and distance mode. Arcade mode gives you 10 balls to use; you must continue to score baskets although it becomes harder each time you score.
Time attack mode requires you to score as many baskets within the time limit as possible; you have unlimited balls but limited time. 
Distance mode allows you to increase the distance of your shot each time that you score. The distance decreases every time you miss a shot, don‚Äôt let the distance reach zero; otherwise, it is game over.

games.howToPlayText: Accuracy is essential in Soccer Training‚Äîfocus on the corners of the goal to improve your scoring opportunities. games.title: Billiards 3D: Russian Pyramid
games.description: Play a realistic online billiards game against virtual opponents of varying difficulty. Customize AI skill levels to match your ability and improve your game. Enjoy lifelike tables of different sizes and refine your strategy in this immersive billiards experience!
games.howToPlayText:
- For aiming click anywhere on the table and rotate the cue
- For precise aiming, turn the precision aim wheel on the right side of the screen, or aim the cue while holding down the Shift button if you play on PC
- To hit, click on the cue on the left side of the screen and pull towards the desired force of the blow, then release
- For screws, click on the ball icon with a dot in the upper right part of the screen, move the impact point and confirm the installation of the point by clicking on the green button. If you're playing on a PC, you can hold down the X button on your keyboard while aiming to move the point of impact
- To change the inclination of the cue, click on the cue ball icon at the top of the screen. In this mode, tap anywhere on the screen and raise the cue to the desired angle, then confirm the change by pressing the green button. If you play on a computer, you can hold down the Z button while aiming, this will also change the tilt of the cue.

games.title: Mini Golf Battle
games.description:
Mini Golf Battle is a fun and casual mini golf challenge where your goal is simple: hit the ball into the hole with as few shots as possible. The game combines easy controls with tricky levels full of slopes, angles, and obstacles that test your timing and precision.
Each level is designed to get a little harder, so you‚Äôll need to aim carefully, control your shot power, and plan the best path to sink the ball. It‚Äôs a relaxing yet addictive golf experience made for quick play sessions.
games.howToPlayText:
Drag/swipe in the direction you want the ball to move.
Pull back and release to adjust the strength of your shot.
The longer you drag, the stronger the hit.
Try to sink the ball into the hole in the fewest strokes possible.
Watch out for walls, ramps, and barriers that can deflect your ball.
Use angles to bounce around corners smartly.

Fire Power:
This bonus gives your ball a flaming speed boost.
It‚Äôs useful for long straight shots or when you want to quickly cross a large gap.
Best used when you need maximum distance in a single strike.

Wing / Glide Power:
This bonus allows your ball to glide smoothly as if it has wings.
It reduces friction and gives your ball a longer travel path with better control.
Ideal for precision shots where you want distance but also don‚Äôt want to overshoot too wildly.

Spring / Bounce Power:
This bonus acts like a spring-loaded push.
It helps your ball bounce forward with extra force, perfect for overcoming obstacles or making tricky jumps.
Best for courses with barriers, ramps, or platforms where normal shots can‚Äôt reach.
